hotels.title: Coastal Five-Star Greece Escape by Relais & Châteaux
hotels.description: Find a slice of paradise in a secluded corner of northern Greece at the five-star Avaton Luxury Hotel & Villas - Relais & Châteaux, a coastal retreat tucked away in a beautiful beachfront location in Halkidiki. Taking you away from the hustle and bustle of more popular Greek destinations, the seaside resort of Nea Roda - reachable in 90 minutes’ drive from Thessaloniki Airport - will allow you to slow down the pace and truly relax amid the crystal-clear waters of Ierissos Bay. Surrounded by beautifully kept gardens and overlooking the blue waters of the bay, this award-winning retreat exudes luxury and elegance: from the Italian silverware to the bespoke furniture, every detail of this Relais & Châteaux property has been carefully considered. With a collection of just 36 luxury rooms, suites and villas, and five-star amenities - including a private beach with plush sunbeds, two restaurants serving innovative Greek fare, a bar where expert bartenders craft modern concoctions, and a beauty and wellness cabana - this is the ultimate sun-kissed escape in one of Greece’s best-kept secrets.
